name: Roforco
long_description:
Roforco is one of the top game studios on Roblox. The team has launched 7 original titles played by over 100 million users and reaching a peak of 10.2 million monthly active users. Top games include:

* https://www.roblox.com/games/10975855395/Korrupt-Zombies-UPDATE
* https://www.roblox.com/games/9746160797/Sunsilk-City
* https://www.roblox.com/games/4983678402/Disney-World-Magic-Kingdom-Theme-Park
* https://www.roblox.com/games/6497455705/UPDATE-Iron-Seas

Roforco drives virality through social reach, with 100K+ TikTok followers, 64K+ Discord members, and tens of millions of views across TikTok and YouTube.

Founded by two 17-year-old high school dropouts whoâ€™ve been building viral consumer products since they were 12.
one_liner: Creating viral AI consumer apps and games
